name: Dark Maze (itch) (Jhony Lucas)
description:
The game challenges you to try to escape our procedural generated mazes while you use the minimun light as possible. If the light is over, game over, you need the light to input the password in the door. The password is hidden around the maze, the exit too. Use the dark to take advantage, don't be afraid of the dark.

Game made in 20 hours, please enjoy! =3

Controls: WASD - Move player. Space - Light your lamp.

Created by: 

Jhony Lucas (@jhonylucas74)

Diego Gonçalves

Aldemir Lucas
